summary: A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.
cast: Jason Evers|Virginia Leith|Anthony La Penna|Adele Lamont|Bonnie Sharie|Paula Morris|Marilyn Hanold|Bruce Brighton|Arny Freeman|Fred Martin|Lola Mason|Doris Brent|Bruce Kerr|Audrey Devereau|Eddie Carmel|Sammy Petrillo
title: El cerebro que no pod√≠a morir
